rows.label: qst202311_msg001
rows.name: We're back!

rows.label: qst202311_msg002
rows.name: Did you really break the four seals?

rows.label: qst202311_msg003
rows.name: Of course!

rows.label: qst202311_msg004
rows.name:
So, where is Thanatobeast Andraz?
You asked your master, right?

rows.label: qst202311_msg005
rows.name:
Yes. The land where the king
of beasts sleeps is...[ML:Dash ] Xataris
Spring in Temperantia.

rows.label: qst202311_msg006
rows.name:
Temperantia, huh...[ML:Dash ] A fitting place
for the king of beasts to sleep.

rows.label: qst202311_msg007
rows.name: Then, let's go at once...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202311_msg008
rows.name: Please wait.

rows.label: qst202311_msg009
rows.name:
Simply going to Xataris
Spring won't be enough to
meet the king of beasts.

rows.label: qst202311_msg010
rows.name: Whaat?! Is that so?!

rows.label: qst202311_msg011
rows.name:
It seems that where the
beast was sealed, a further
seal has been placed.

rows.label: qst202311_msg012
rows.name:
You must destroy the sealstones of
Light, Darkness, Thunder, and Ice.

rows.label: qst202311_msg013
rows.name:
Another seal, mo? This is
getting complicated, mo...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202311_msg014
rows.name: But if it's sealed so securely...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202311_msg015
rows.name:
it must have been a truly
vicious monster, right?

rows.label: qst202311_msg016
rows.name: There's no doubt about it, mo.

rows.label: qst202311_msg017
rows.name:
If it's not the ultimate opponent,
my frustration will explode...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202311_msg018
rows.name: Well, we know the location!

rows.label: qst202311_msg019
rows.name:
Let's go to Xataris Spring,
break the seal, and face
Thanatobeast Andraz!

rows.label: qst202311_msg020
rows.name: Yaegiri! Wait a minute, mo!
